scripts.compile:swc:inner:separate: run clean && run swc src -d dist/src & run swc generated -d dist/generated & run swc integration-tests -d dist/integration-tests
scripts.compile:swc:outer:relative: run clean && cd ..; yarn run -T swc backend -d backend/dist --config-file backend/.swcrc
scripts.compile:swc:outer:absolute: run clean && cd ..; yarn run -T swc $PWD -d $PWD/dist --config-file $PWD/.swcrc
